description: Lambda name mappings for katelynns-photo (photography client management platform)
pattern: Code folders are under backend/{name}. AWS name: katelynns-photo-{name} with underscores replaced by hyphens. No branch suffix — single Lambda per environment.
notes: This project uses different AWS accounts/profiles than AssetWatch
There is no branch suffix — each environment has one Lambda (no per-branch deploys)

mappings.description: FastAPI app (via Mangum) — album listing, file access, ZIP downloads. Client-facing authenticated API.
Album registration, user assignment with expiration. Requires Admin Cognito group.
Async ZIP generation triggered via SQS queue
